title: Friedell and MacMahon
description:
Zach Lowe and ESPN's Nick Friedell discuss Steve Nash, Kyrie Irving, and the mess in Brooklyn. Then ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Zach play "Are you worried yet?" about the Warriors, Wolves, and Nuggets.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
